title: Alibaba shares jump 15% as company rides China's Artificial Intelligence growth wave
description: Alibaba's stock surged nearly 15%, fuelled by a strong performance in its AI segment and 26% increase in sales in its cloud division. Despite a modest 2% rise in overall income, investor concerns eased due to Alibaba's leadership in AI amid fierce competition with rivals in the e-commerce sector.
content:
Alibaba Group Holding Ltd’s stock experienced an almost 15% increase, marking its highest intraday gain since February in Hong Kong.
This surge in Alibaba's stock was driven by the company's strong performance in the artificial intelligence (AI) sect... [3133 chars]

title: AI-enhanced, immersive 'Wizard of Oz' debuts in Las Vegas
description: Swirling winds, drone-operated monkeys and artificial intelligence brought new life to “The Wizard of Oz” on Thursday at the premiere of an immersive version of the Hollywood classic in Las Vegas.

title: AI may be brought under new digital competition law
description: Govt may bring artificial intelligence under the upcoming Digital Competition Bill. The move would extend ex-ante antitrust rules to AI, addressing risks of data monopolisation, algorithmic collusion and market dominance by Big Tech, as regulators worldwide tighten AI oversight.
content: As the government is re-drafting the Digital Competition Bill (DCB) with a view to making it more in tune with the market realities, it may explicitly extend the proposed special antitrust regime for the digital economy to the emerging area of artifi... [5560 chars]

title: Apple ‘Awe Dropping’ Event on 9 September: iPhone 17 Pro Max, 17 Air and 17 Pro pricing tipped
description: On September 9, 2025, Apple will present its 'Awe Dropping' keynote at the Steve Jobs Theatre, focusing on the iPhone 17 series and updates to other products, along with advancements in artificial intelligence technology.

title: HESTA demands boards act on cybersecurity, AI risks
description: HESTA has put boards on notice that it wants to see directors with experience in cybersecurity and artificial intelligence to boost companies’ “global resilience”.

title: Big increase in AI usage in workplaces - Ibec
description: New research from business group Ibec has found a big increase in the use of artificial intelligence (AI) in workplaces.
content:
New research from business group Ibec has found a big increase in the use of artificial intelligence (AI) in workplaces.
The study shows that in July 2025, 40% of employees reported using AI in their workplace tasks compared with 19% in August 2024.
